sentences.en: As a result, legislator employ various procedual devices to handle knotty problems.
sentences.cn: 结果, 议员们便采取种种程序性的手法来对付棘手的问题.

sentences.en: He had to discuss knotty points of Rousseau and Hegel with her.
sentences.cn: 他不得不和她讨论卢梭和黑格尔的那些深奥问题.

sentences.en: He was scowling fearfully, and I judged that he was concocting a particularly knotty editorial.
sentences.cn: 他皱眉瞪眼,样子很可怕, 我估计他是在拼凑一篇特别伤脑筋的社论.

sentences.en: I judged that he was concocting a particularly knotty editorial.
sentences.cn: 我估计他是在拼凑一篇特别伤脑筋的社论.

sentences.en: It is almost impossible to skirt the knotty problem.
sentences.cn: 想回避这个棘手的问题几乎是不可能的.

sentences.en: Mrs. Wu Sun - fu looked suddenly worried, as if she was wrestling with some knotty problem.
sentences.cn: 吴少奶奶一面说, 一面她的眼神忽然散乱,似乎有什么难以解决的问题忽然抓住了她的心了.

sentences.en: She met with a lot of knotty problems.
sentences.cn: 她碰上了许多棘手的问题.

sentences.en: The foxed the arrogant instructor with a knotty problem.
sentences.cn: 那位受训的队员故意用难题把傲慢的“教练”搞糊涂.

sentences.en: The knotty problem which affects production has been solved.
sentences.cn: 解决了影响快速达产的难题.

sentences.en: the knotty roots of the old oak tree
The new man-agement team faces some knotty problems.
sentences.cn: 新的管理团队面临一些棘手的问题。

sentences.en: The new management team faces some knotty problems.
sentences.cn: 新的管理团队面临一些棘手的问题。

sentences.en: The trainee foxed the arrogant instructor with a knotty problem.
sentences.cn: 那位受训的队员故意用难题把傲慢的教练搞糊涂.
这是一段复杂难懂的文字.

sentences.en: Under his leadership, many knotty problems were smoothly solved.
sentences.cn: 在他的领导下, 许多伤脑筋的问题都迎刃而解.

words.tran_cn: （绳等的）结；节瘤，疙瘩；海里/小时（航速单位）
棘手的，难解决的；[木]多节的；有结的

trans.tran_cn: （指木材）多结节的，多节瘤的，困难的，棘手的
trans.tran_en: knotty wood contains a lot of hard round places where branches once joined the tree
